    • useStrongInstances

      ThreadLocalSecureRandom.ThreadLocalSecureRandomBuilder useStrongInstances(boolean value)
      Specifies to use the strongest but probably blocking crypto source available (e.g. /dev/random on Unix). useStrongInstances(boolean) and algorithm(String) are mutually exclusive
